full_text: state eRe 2019/KER/1047 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE K.ABRAHAM MATHEW WEDNESDAY, THE O9TH DAY OF JANUARY 2019 / 19TH POUSHA, 1940 Cri.MC.No. 181 of 2019 cc 1056/2015 OF J.M.F.C.-II, ATTINGAL CRIME NO. 619/2015 OF KAZHAKKUTTOM POLICE STATION , THIRUVANANTHAPURAM PETITIONER/S: 1 RAJEEV AGED 27 YEARS S/O.RAJAN, KUTTIVILAKATHUVEEDU, PALLINADA, ATTINKUZHI, THIRUVANANTHAPURAM. 2 SAJIN SATHYAN AGED 27 YEARS S/O.SATHYAN, JEEJA BHAVAN, NEAR CHRISTIAN CHURCH, ATTIPRA, THIRUVANANTHAPURAM. 3 SUMESH AGED 27 YEARS S/O.SURESH BABU, MANAKATTUVILAKAM VEEDU, PALLINADA, ATTINKUZHI, THIRUVANANTHAPURAM. BY ADV. SRI.N.SASI RESPONDENT/S: 1 STATE OF KERALA, REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM-682011. Elsie esl Skee 2019/KER/1047 Cr1.MC.No. 181 of 2019 1.2., 2 ARUN, S/O.ARUNACHALAM, AGED 26 YEARS, A.R. NIVAS, THEKKEMUKKU, KAZHAKOOTTAM, THIRUVANANTHAPURAM. BY ADV. SMT.T.M.BINITHA OTHER PRESENT: SRI ALEX M THOMBRA- SR PUBLIC PROSECUTOR THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 09.01.2019, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: ORDER Petition filed under Section 482 Cr.P.C. 2. The petitioners are the accused in CC No. 1056 of 2015 on the file of the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court-II, Attingal registered for the offences under Sections 294(b), 323 & 324 of the Indian Penal Code. The second respondent is the victim. It is submitted that the matter has been settled and the proceedings in the criminal case may be quashed. 3. Heard the learned counsel for the petitioners eae 2019/KER/1047 Crl.MC.No. 181 of 2019 1.3.. and the second respondent and the learned Public Prosecutor. 4. I have perused the affidavit filed by the second respondent, who has entered appearance through counsel. I am satisfied that the allegation of settlement is true and no public interest is involved. There is no impediment for granting the prayer of the petitioners. 5. In the result, this Crl.M.C. is allowed. The proceedings in CC No. 1056 of 2015 on the file of the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court-II, Attingal are quashed. The learned magistrate may pass appropriate orders for the disposal of the material objects, if any, produced in the case. Sd/- K.ABRAHAM MATHEW JUDGE Bka/10.01.2019 state Elz 2019/KER/1047 Cri.MC.No. 181 of 2019 APPENDIX PETITIONER'S/S EXHIBITS: ANNEXURE Al CERTIFIED COPY OF THE FIR IN CRIME NO.619/2015 OF KAZHAKOOTTAM POLICE STATION DATED 8.6.2015. ANNEXURE A2 CERTIFIED COPY OF THE FINAL REPORT IN CRIME NO.619/2015 FILED BEFORE THE JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATES COURT NO.II, ATTINGAL. ANNEXURE A3 NOTARIZED COPY OF THE AFFIDAVIT OF THE 2ND RESPONDENT DATED 12.12.2018.
